name: Paradise Cruise
description:
You are a cruise manager dedicated to providing your guests with a clean, error-free, experience; however, some mishaps do occur and those mishaps add up very quickly. Try to see how long you can go without getting a bad yelp review :0!

 (Some errors occur with the music overlapping itself and such. So if that occurs, feel free to just turn off your computer volume whoops ://)

Main song - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
